summary: If there's one thing I'm good at, it's torturing a metaphor.  I grew up wrapped in quilts — my mom has made them for years (as a hobby and later, professionally).  It's a passion, it's a patchwork assemblage of fabric — designs, patterns, mementos...
title: A personal website is a bit like a quilt

summary: Starter Villain won this year’s Dragon Award for Best Science Fiction Novel.  Neat.  Thank you to everyone at Tor, particularly my editor Patrick Nielsen Hayden, my cover artist Tristan Elwell, and everyone who voted for the novel...
title: Hey, Look at That
